reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For just under $65 this is a really great chair. It's very well made and exceptionaly comfortable for a computer chair.. It's light weight and moves easily across my sculptured rug. It's adjustable to many different angles and is easy to switch from one angle to another. Have had several computer chairs in the past but this one is by far the absolute best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and was easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice chair Good price
reviews.reviewText: Well made and very comfortable…not the easiest to put together by yourself I had to hammer in the wheels but once all assembled makes a very nice home office chair. I got the pink and it a very pretty color this chair rocks back and forth which is very nice and armrests are well placed. The lumbar support keeps you from slouching and makes you less fatigue especially after long days of work …Overall I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Office Chair for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Easy assemble, and is a comfortable chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but Unstable
reviews.reviewText: I really want to like this chair. It is comfortable and the color (orange) is great but the wheel base is a bit too narrow and there unstable. The narrow base means that if for example you drop something and lean over to pick it up while still seated in the chair, you are likely to have the chair turn over and end up on the floor. In my case the chair hasn’t been used much but 2 people have now ended up on the floor. The chair is comfortable but you have to be very careful sitting in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price point, good comfort for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dying ducks and arm wrestling!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Do you want a chair that every time you move gives an awful (can’t call it a squeak) dying duck quack sound that’ll disrupt your zoom meetings and have clients asking if you have a pet duck? Then this chair is it for you.Sure it was easy to put together. Instructions are clear and concise. My 5 year old nephew could “build” the chair.Notice the chair is a little unstable. Not like it’s going to give with you sitting on it. Just didn’t piece/fit well together the way should. So much so the right arm popped off the back rest. I was annoyed trying to work with a unstable armrest. And I thought how did I use the wrong screw. Upon inspection- I learned I didn’t. Tried to reattach but to no avail, this arm wrestle was awarded to the “Dying Duck”. The threading insert has “stripped” but not by me. In a space of about 1/4 of circumference, is as smooth as a refinished I-35 one day after construction is done, nothing grabs until it’s pass the smooth space. Now I know stainless steel metal is soft and can strip easily. But this is a manufacturing defect. Sadly. “You get what you pay for”, like a haircut from SuperCuts on the Thursday special at $5 a cut.Are you someone with extra padding on your bum and needing a cushioned seat isn’t a comfort need- then this chair will exceed that. The seat is hard and the cushion/padding gives to much so mine as well sit on a hard back book.Not recommended to use for duck hunting (ducks are scared of the sound of other dying ducks), would not place in a library- unless you can sit super still and don’t need to breathe, but would absolutely use as a children’s desk chair- “tell them kids don’t leave their desk til their homework is done and if they do, you’ll know by the ringing sound of this not melodious chair.”Need a sacrificial chair to pull off a prank, you’ll definitely get your bang for your buck with this one.Now if I was smarter I would sent this chair back for a refund. But I missed the 30-day window. So now I am searching for a new silent fart catcher- that’s exactly that- silent! Hope this helps!!
Easy to build, fairly comfortable, but very loud. Every time I shift my sitting position it make loud creaking noises.

I was hesitant to purchase this due to all the "noise" complaints but I haven't had any issues. It was super easy to put together and someone even melted in L & R so the arms go on the right sides. The fabric on the seat is drying / rough so make sure you have pants on. The backing is very supportive and comfy. The wheels work well on hardwood, almost too well because if you don't hold it when sitting down, it will run away. The only thing I would suggest is making the instructions clearer as to how you lock the chair to the base because it took a while of me pulling the chair right off when I tried to raise it before realizing that the final drawing which shows how not to tilt too far back also shows how to lock the chair to the base. I also had to fabreeze the seat as it smelt like sweet vinegar when first taking it out of the box.

I like this chair. I really do. It's comfy, affordable, and looks nice. However, the construction is difficult, and the one that I got doesn't allow me to properly put one of the support wheels in. If these weren't issues, it would be 5 stars easy, but I have to bump it down to 4 due to these issues. The support wheel not being there isn't too bad if I keep the bad wheel to the front, and the installation was hard but only at one part for me; screwing the backrest and the seat together. I have a feeling the one I got was returned by someone that either had a faulty wheel slot, or damaged the slot. Still a great chair, but far from perfect.
とても座り心地もいいし買って良かった。
For the price this is a great office chair. Easy to assemble, great rollers and good back support. The seat was a bit hard/firm but softened with useAlso, looks very nice.Cheers
